verses.verse: Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on his father's face, <S%H6440><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> him and kissed <S%H5401><s%> him.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%> the physicians <S%H7495><s%> to embalm <S%H2590><s%> his father. So the physicians <S%H1><s%> embalmed <S%H7495><s%> Israel. <S%H2590><s%>

Now forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> were required <S%H4390><s%> for it, for such <S%H3651><s%> is the period <S%H3117><s%> required <S%H4390><s%> for embalming. <S%H9151><s%> And the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> for him seventy <S%H7657><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

And when the days <S%H3117><s%> of mourning <S%H1068><s%> for him were past, <S%H5674><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the household <S%H1004><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "If <S%H518><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> please <S%H4994><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

'My father made me swear, <S%H1><s%> saying, <S%H7650><s%> "Behold, <S%H559><s%> I am about to die; <S%H2009><s%> in my grave <S%H4191><s%> which <S%H6913><s%> I dug <S%H834><s%> for myself in the land <S%H3738><s%> of Canaan, <S%H776><s%> there <S%H3667><s%> you shall bury <S%H8033><s%> me." Now <S%H6912><s%> therefore, please <S%H6258><s%> let me go <S%H4994><s%> up and bury <S%H5927><s%> my father; then I will return. <S%H6912><s%>' "
And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Go <S%H5927><s%> up and bury <S%H6912><s%> your father, as he made you swear. <S%H1><s%>"

So Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to bury <S%H6912><s%> his father, and with him went <S%H1><s%> up all <S%H5927><s%> the servants <S%H3605><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H5650><s%> the elders <S%H6547><s%> of his household <S%H2205><s%> and all <S%H1004><s%> the elders <S%H3605><s%> of the land <S%H2205><s%> of Egypt, <S%H776><s%>

and all <S%H3605><s%> the household <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> and his brothers <S%H251><s%> and his father's household; <S%H1004><s%> they left <S%H5800><s%> only <S%H7534><s%> their little <S%H2945><s%> ones <S%H2945><s%> and their flocks <S%H6629><s%> and their herds <S%H1241><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen. <S%H1657><s%>
There also went <S%H5927><s%> up with him both <S%H1571><s%> chariots <S%H7393><s%> and horsemen; <S%H6571><s%> and it was a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H3515><s%> company. <S%H4264><s%>

When they came <S%H935><s%> to the threshing <S%H1637><s%> floor <S%H1637><s%> of Atad, <S%H329><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> they lamented <S%H5594><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> with a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and sorrowful <S%H3515><s%> lamentation; <S%H4553><s%> and he observed <S%H6213><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> mourning <S%H60><s%> for his father.

Now when the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the mourning <S%H60><s%> at the threshing <S%H1637><s%> floor <S%H1637><s%> of Atad, <S%H329><s%> they said, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> is a grievous <S%H3515><s%> mourning <S%H60><s%> for the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>" Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> it was named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> Abel-mizraim, which <S%H834><s%> is beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>
And thus <S%H3651><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> for him as he had charged <S%H6680><s%> them;

for his sons <S%H1121><s%> carried <S%H5375><s%> him to the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and buried <S%H6912><s%> him in the cave <S%H4631><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> of Machpelah <S%H4375><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Mamre, <S%H4471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> had bought <S%H7069><s%> along with the field <S%H7704><s%> for a burial <S%H6913><s%> site <S%H272><s%> from Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the Hittite. <S%H2850><s%>

And after <S%H310><s%> he had buried <S%H6912><s%> his father, Joseph <S%H1><s%> returned <S%H3130><s%> to Egypt, <S%H7725><s%> he and his brothers, <S%H4714><s%> and all <S%H251><s%> who had gone <S%H3605><s%> up with him to bury <S%H5927><s%> his father.

When Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s brothers <S%H251><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that their father was dead, <S%H1><s%> they said, <S%H4191><s%> "What if Joseph should bear <S%H559><s%> a grudge <S%H7852><s%> against <S%H7852><s%> us and pay <S%H7852><s%> us back <S%H7725><s%> in full <S%H7725><s%> for all <S%H7725><s%> the wrong <S%H3605><s%> which <S%H9567><s%> we did <S%H834><s%> to him!"
So they sent <S%H6680><s%> [a message] to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Your father charged <S%H1><s%> before <S%H6680><s%> he died, <S%H6440><s%> saying, <S%H4194><s%>

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> you shall say <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> forgive, <S%H5375><s%> I beg <S%H577><s%> you, the transgression <S%H6588><s%> of your brothers <S%H251><s%> and their sin, <S%H9128><s%> for they did <S%H1580><s%> you wrong. <S%H9567><s%>"' And now, <S%H6258><s%> please <S%H4994><s%> forgive <S%H5375><s%> the transgression <S%H6588><s%> of the servants <S%H5650><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of your father. "And Joseph <S%H1><s%> wept <S%H3130><s%> when they spoke <S%H1058><s%> to him.

Then his brothers <S%H251><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> came <S%H1980><s%> and fell <S%H5307><s%> down <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him and said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> we are your servants. <S%H5650><s%>"
But Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Do not be afraid, <S%H3372><s%> for am I in God's place <S%H8478><s%>?

"And as for you, you meant <S%H2803><s%> evil <S%H9567><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, [but] God <S%H430><s%> meant <S%H2803><s%> it for good <S%H9186><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> to bring <S%H6213><s%> about <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> present <S%H3117><s%> result, to preserve <S%H2421><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> alive. <S%H2421><s%>

"So <S%H6258><s%> therefore, do not be afraid; <S%H3372><s%> I will provide <S%H3557><s%> for you and your little <S%H2945><s%> ones. <S%H2945><s%>" So he comforted <S%H5162><s%> them and spoke <S%H1696><s%> kindly <S%H3820><s%> to them.

Now Joseph <S%H3130><s%> stayed <S%H3427><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> he and his father's household, <S%H1004><s%> and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the third <S%H8029><s%> generation of Ephraim's sons; <S%H1121><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Machir, <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> on Joseph's knees. <S%H1290><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his brothers, <S%H251><s%> "I am about to die, <S%H4191><s%> but God <S%H430><s%> will surely <S%H6485><s%> take <S%H6485><s%> care <S%H6485><s%> of you, and bring <S%H5927><s%> you up from this <S%H2088><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He promised <S%H7650><s%> on oath <S%H7650><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>"

Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> made the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> swear, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> will surely <S%H6485><s%> take <S%H6485><s%> care <S%H6485><s%> of you, and you shall carry <S%H5927><s%> my bones <S%H6106><s%> up from here. <S%H2088><s%>"

So Joseph <S%H3130><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> at the age <S%H1121><s%> of one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%> and he was embalmed <S%H2590><s%> and placed <S%H7760><s%> in a coffin <S%H727><s%> in Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
